idea:

name: MILAN SALES CORPORATION

idea:

Creating an ecosystem which enables existing and new retailer to do business smoothly.
name: Leo BizTech Consulting

idea:
Selltm is an assisted-commerce company, first of its kind in the world. The model is very unique. Many Indian entrepreneurs are now creating new products and services. We are revolutionizing the human-driven sales in the country by uniformly empowering the citizens regardless of their geographical location, gender, and age.

Our distribution network is helping these entrepreneurs
name: NEWFANGLED INTERNET PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
HouseThat is a Sales and Marketing firm in the real estate sector in Mumbai. We are associated with premium developers such as Godrej Properties Ltd, L&T Realty, Wadhwa Group, etc.
We help these developers in BTL marketing of their under-construction residential projects. Some of the activities are SEO/SEM, targeted social media campaigns, e-mail marketing, telecalling, SMS/WhatsApp marketing, corporate/society activations and print inserts.
name: HouseThat LLP

idea:
Science Kidz is a place where both children and adults experience an explosion of fun, creativity and learning in a dynamic environment. This is a place where ideas, innovation and interaction come together and engage young minds in a practical environment.
STEAM - the present and the future of science, technology and learning is manifested by bright, enthusiastic, children in the various robots that they think up of, build and program by themselves. Our students come up with all sorts of innovative ideas that integrate Robotics and technology into our daily lives. From the unique idea of building a smart stick for the blind to a device that sends out an alert if the cooking stove is left on by mistake - the ideas our young minds display have no boundaries.
Apart from these exhibits, we also have Robolympics - an Olympiad competition of robots. Robots built by our students compete with each other in various kinds of sports such as rob-hockey, robo-weightlifting, robo-hurdle race, robo-bowling and lego-robotics. Such competitions of robots help to attract and engage young minds towards Science, Robotics and Programming.
For more information you can go through OUR WEBSITE.
name: SCIENCE KIDZ EDUCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
To carry on the business, in India or Abroad, either on principal to principal or agency
or any other basis, of giving to any person, on rental/Hiring basis, any Power
Generating equipment like Power Generators (operated with ‘Diesel/Gas/HFO’) by
whatever name called and any other industrial equipment like Compressors, Chillers,
Transformers etc with or without the support staff to operate and maintain and to carry
out other activities relating to above purposes, including but not limited to
(i) Providing customised solution for Power Backup or Captive Power Generation
(ii) providing expert support staff/Accessories/material/ consumables to operate and
maintain the equipment or machine (iii) subcontracting, in part or full, any or all of the
above activities or any related activities.
name: MODERN ENERGY RENTAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Soundrome is a music and music video streaming platform whose main intention is to unify all the countless music streaming platforms around the world so that, users can come to one place on the internet, knowing that they will find the content that they are looking for.


Here’s what sets Soundrome apart. We are not Spotify. We are not SoundCloud. Neither are we competing with them. What we are is combining their amazing libraries and serving the user with their content and adding a layer of awesome features and combining brilliant technology to provided the user with an out-of-the-world experience. Instead of the user having to download multiple applications (of these providers), all they would ever need is Soundrome. The rest is taken care by us!
name: Soundrome

idea:
My idea is  to shorten the gap between buyers and sellers around the world.

My idea will connect people in B2B & B2C.

Today is the digital age, where people will be having access to Indian  products and services from my online portal from India to the global scale.
name: Somras

idea: An AI machine learning application that understands the user spending behavior and provides them suggestions on how to save more money based on the monthly saving goals of the user.
name: AISHA
